tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT ${uspCampaign.id}, count(*) FROM usersession where useraction.application in ("${app.name}") and ${conversionGoal} and  ${uspCampaign.id} IS NOT NULL group by ${uspCampaign.id}

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT ${uspCampaign.id}, count(*) FROM usersession where useraction.application in ("${app.name}") and ${conversionGoal} and  ${uspCampaign.id} IS NOT NULL and userExperienceScore <> "SATISFIED" group by ${uspCampaign.id}

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown: ## [Conversions by Campaign (Today)](https://ruxit-production-1.live.dynatrace.com/ui/user-sessions/query?sessionquery=SELECT%20usersessionid,%20${uspCampaign.id},%20hasSessionReplay,%20numberOfRageClicks,%20totalErrorCount,%20useraction.duration%20FROM%20usersession%20where useraction.application in ("${app.name}") and ${conversionGoal} and %20${uspCampaign.id}%20IS%20NOT%20NULL%20and%20useraction.name%3D%22loading%20of%20page%20%2Ftrial%2F%22%20order%20by%20totalerrorcount,%20numberOfRageClicks%20DESC&gtf=today)

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown: ## [Risk Conversions by Campaign (Today)](https://ruxit-production-1.live.dynatrace.com/ui/user-sessions/query?sessionquery=SELECT%20usersessionid,%20${uspCampaign.id},%20hasSessionReplay,%20numberOfRageClicks,%20totalErrorCount,%20useraction.duration%20FROM%20usersession%20where useraction.application in ("${app.name}") and ${conversionGoal} and %20${uspCampaign.id}%20IS%20NOT%20NULL%20and%20useraction.name%3D%22loading%20of%20page%20%2Ftrial%2F%22%20and%20userExperienceScore%3C%3E%22SATISFIED%22%20order%20by%20totalerrorcount,%20numberOfRageClicks%20DESC&gtf=today)
